name: Trolley Problems
description:
Welcome to Trolley Problems, the ethical dilemma game that will have you questioning your moral compass.

In this game, you'll be presented with a series of scenarios where you must decide the best course of action. Do you choose the option that benefits the most people, or do you prioritize the needs of the individual? The decisions you make will not only impact the outcome of the game, but they will also reveal your personal values and beliefs.

Test your moral compass and see where you stand on controversial issues with Trolley Problems.
